section.title: Valve.VR.SteamVR_Action_Pose_Base< SourceMap, SourceElement > Class Template Reference

para.para: The base pose action (pose and skeleton inherit from this)

listitem.para: SteamVR_Action_Pose_Base ()
virtual void UpdateValues (bool skipStateAndEventUpdates)
[Should not be called by user code] Updates the data for all the input sources the system has detected need to be updated.
bool GetVelocitiesAtTimeOffset (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource, float secondsFromNow, out Vector3 velocity, out Vector3 angularVelocity)
SteamVR keeps a log of past poses so you can retrieve old poses or estimated poses in the future by passing in a secondsFromNow value that is negative or positive.
bool GetPoseAtTimeOffset (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource, float secondsFromNow, out Vector3 localPosition, out Quaternion localRotation, out Vector3 velocity, out Vector3 angularVelocity)
SteamVR keeps a log of past poses so you can retrieve old poses or estimated poses in the future by passing in a secondsFromNow value that is negative or positive.
virtual void UpdateTransform (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource, Transform transformToUpdate)
Update a transform's local position and local roation to match the pose from the most recent update
Vector3 GetLocalPosition (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The local position of this action relative to the universe origin
Quaternion GetLocalRotation (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The local rotation of this action relative to the universe origin
Vector3 GetVelocity (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The local velocity of this pose relative to the universe origin
Vector3 GetAngularVelocity (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The local angular velocity of this pose relative to the universe origin
bool GetDeviceIsConnected (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
True if the device bound to this action and input source is connected
bool GetPoseIsValid (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
True if the pose retrieved for this action and input source is valid (good data from the tracking source)
ETrackingResult GetTrackingResult (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The state of the tracking system that is used to create pose data (position, rotation, etc)
Vector3 GetLastLocalPosition (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The local position for this pose during the previous update
Quaternion GetLastLocalRotation (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The local rotation for this pose during the previous update
Vector3 GetLastVelocity (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The velocity for this pose during the previous update
Vector3 GetLastAngularVelocity (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The angular velocity for this pose during the previous update
bool GetLastDeviceIsConnected (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
True if the device bound to this action was connected during the previous update
bool GetLastPoseIsValid (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
True if the pose was valid during the previous update
ETrackingResult GetLastTrackingResult (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
The tracking state for this pose during the previous update
static void SetUniverseOrigin (ETrackingUniverseOrigin newOrigin)
Sets all pose (and skeleton) actions to use the specified universe origin.
